name: Karen Strang Allen
what_you_do: Karen Strang Allen is a love and empowerment coach who helps individuals navigate their romantic relationships and build self-worth to attract healthy partnerships.
who_you_serve: She serves individuals, particularly women, who struggle with love, self-esteem, and relationship boundaries.
bio: Winner of Ottawa's 2017 World Class Speaker award, certified Jack Canfield trainer, and experience with clients like eWomen’s Network and Health Canada.
business_focus: Karen Strang Allen is a love and empowerment coach who helps individuals navigate their romantic relationships and build self-worth to attract healthy partnerships. (love coaching)
